message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
I'm willing to give you a little more, Bob, but I still think a 55/45 split is fair given the inflation.
Inflation is hitting you hard, maybe we should settle this quickly?
Okay, Bob, let's make a deal. I'm willing to give you 60% this time, but I need to at least get 4000. This inflation is eating away at my gains!
